string.name: currentlyStreaming
string.comment: %s is the title of the stream, chosen by the streamer.

string.name: lastStream
string.comment: %s is how long ago the stream was in relative time (e.g. 50 minutes ago). It is displayed in smaller type than the rest of the string.

resources.string: Ali imaš Twitch ali Youtube kanal?
Vključite ključno besedo \"lichess.org\" v vaš naslov oddaje, ko prenašate na Lichess-u.
Odstranite ključno besedo, ko prenašate dogodke, ki niso povezani z Lichess-om.
Lichess bo samodejno zaznal vaš prenos in omogočil naslednje prednosti:

string.name: rule4
string.comment: the resulting message is: Read our streaming Fairplay FAQ to ensure a fair play for everyone in your stream

resources.string: Preberite naš %s, da zagotovite pošteno igro za vse med pretočnim predvajanjem.
pogosta vprašnja o prenosu poštene igre
Pridobite gorečo ikono voditelja prenosa v svojem profilu Lichess.
Skočite na vrh seznama voditeljev oddaj.
Predvajajte vaš prenos v svojih igrah, turnirjih in študijah.
Prosim, izpolnite informacije o voditelju oddaj in naložite sliko.
Ko ste pripravljeni, da se uvrstite na seznam voditeljev prenosov, %s

string.name: requestReview
string.comment:
requestReview
Used as part of the longer sentence: "When you are ready to be listed as a Lichess streamer, request a moderator review"

resources.string: Lichessova stran streamerja je namenjena vašemu občinstvu v jeziku, ki ga zagotavlja vaša platforma za pretakanje. V aplikaciji ali storitvi, ki jo uporabljate za oddajanje, nastavite pravilen privzeti jezik za svoje šahovske prenose.

string.name: twitchUsername
string.comment:
Appears on the form for setting up your Streamer page: https://lichess.org/streamer/edit
Twitch is a proper noun and refers to the streaming service https://twitch.tv/. Please do not translate the word 'Twitch'.

resources.string: Vaše Twitch uporabniško ime ali URL
Neobvezno. Pustite prazno, če ga ni

string.name: youTubeChannelId
string.comment:
Appears on the form for setting up your Streamer page: https://lichess.org/streamer/edit
The Channel ID is a special alphanumeric string. See Google's guide here for how to retrieve it: https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/3250431
We encourage translators to match what the Channel ID is called in your language's version of YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/account_advanced

resources.string: Vaše ime kot voditelj prenosa na Lichess
Povejte nam o svojem prenosu v enem stavku
